channel.title: NPC's saying if your on... And how to change where a portal tele's you
channel.description:
Thats basically it.
*Need to know what to put in for a NPC to say weither Me the owner is on. *And Need to know where to change to make it so a Portal will tele me to a different spot.

item.title: NPC's saying if your on... And how to change where a portal tele's you
item.dc:creator: @mr_hate mr. hate
item.description:
@mr_hate wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 5) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“mr hate”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “mr hate is ofine ftl!”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = mr hate is online ftw!";
}
}
}
npc id is the id u want the npc to be and the mr hate is ofline ftl is when hes offline and online is online
isplayeron is the name u want the code to reconize say u want it to be ur name change it to that ill let u figure out the rest ;). hope i helped.
